infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Key needs camera access to let you take photos and send them in private conversations. For example, when chatting with a friend, you can tap the camera button to capture a photo that gets encrypted before being sent. Photos are never stored on our servers unencrypted and only you and your recipient can view them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Key needs photo library access to let you select existing photos and send them in private conversations. For example, when chatting with a friend, you can tap the gallery button to pick a photo that gets encrypted before being sent. Photos are never stored on our servers unencrypted and only you and your recipient can view them.

plugins.photosPermission: Key needs photo library access to let you select existing photos and send them in private conversations. For example, when chatting with a friend, you can tap the gallery button to pick a photo that gets encrypted before being sent. Photos are never stored on our servers unencrypted and only you and your recipient can view them.
plugins.cameraPermission: Key needs camera access to let you take photos and send them in private conversations. For example, when chatting with a friend, you can tap the camera button to capture a photo that gets encrypted before being sent. Photos are never stored on our servers unencrypted and only you and your recipient can view them.
